TF090837-MDTF FOR ALBANIA CAPACITY
            BUILDING & SUPPORT TO IMPLEMENT THE INTEGRATE,TF090843-MDTF FOR ALBANIA CAPACITY
            BUILDING & SUPPORT TO IMPLEMENT THE INTEGRAT-

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Capacity Building
            and Support to Implement the Integrated Planning System
            Project is to ensure that the Government of Albania's
            core policy and financial processes function in a coherent,
            efficient and integrated manner, through building sufficient
            and sustainable capacity in line ministries to participate
            fully in IPS. The project changes include: (i) extending the
            closing date by one year to September 30, 2011 to implement
            one of the most important project objectives  a fully
            functional treasury system to support AFMIS (Albanian
            Financial Management Information System); (ii) account for
            additional financial resources to be provided from SIDA (0.4
            million), and in addition for previously unbudgeted
            resources (of  0.77 million) (this is the difference between
            total donor pledges  and the value of  resources in the
            Trust Fund); and (iii) introducing the revised results
            framework matrix to reflect all the changes which had taken
            place from 2008 and to align better with the new closing date.
